name: Indiefund.It
tag_list: crowdfunding, campaign-management, campaign-development, strategy, marketing, planning, project-management, pitching
overview:
Business Summary: Boutique creative agency providing Crowdfunding campaign development and delivery. IndieFund.It assists companies in all facets of campaign definition, planning, pre- launch, launch and post-launch activities. IndieFund.It brings together a team providing social media strategy, media production, campaigner production, business planning, strategic marketing and crowdfunding expertise.

Product/Services: IndieFund.It specializes in crowdfunding campaign development & execution. Additional services are often required, such as: Strategic & Tactical Marketing ‣ Market Research & Competitive Analysis ‣ Media Planning, Coordination & Production ‣ Social Media Presence & Management ‣ Audience Development & Management ‣ Business Planning ‣ Business Model Development ‣ Corporate Coaching

Customer problem: IndieFund.It solves the problem that many small businesses and individuals have in creating a compelling and successful crowdfunding campaign. IndieFund.it promotes access to capital for small business.
